title: Country Profile
description: Schema for country-specific healthcare content governance profiles

id.description: Unique identifier for the country profile (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code preferred)

age_of_medical_consent.description: Age at which individuals can consent to healthcare without parental involvement (use lowest age if varies by context)

age_of_consent_notes.description: Additional context about age of consent variations (e.g., mature minor doctrine, specific context variations)
examples: Varies by state; ranges from 14-18. Mature minor doctrine applies in some states.
Generally 16, but varies by type of treatment. Sexual health services available from 13 with confidentiality.
18 in most contexts, but parental consent not required for emergency care or specific reproductive health services.

restricted_topics.description: Topics that are legally restricted or culturally sensitive requiring special handling

cultural_considerations.description: Cultural factors affecting healthcare content delivery

individualism_collectivism.description: Cultural tendency toward individual or collective decision-making

family_involvement_expectation.description: Expected level of family involvement in healthcare decisions

stigmatized_conditions.description: Health conditions carrying significant stigma in this context

examples: Gender-egalitarian context; mixed-gender healthcare discussions normalized.
Gender-segregated healthcare discussions preferred. Female healthcare topics especially sensitive.
Modesty considerations important. Gender of healthcare provider may be preference or requirement.

religious_healthcare_considerations.description: Religious factors affecting healthcare beliefs or practices
examples: Diverse religious contexts; some communities have specific healthcare practices based on faith.
Majority Muslim context; halal considerations, modesty, prayer times, Ramadan fasting health implications.
Varied religious contexts including restrictions on blood transfusions (Jehovah's Witnesses), dietary laws affecting medical nutrition.

legal_notes.description: Legal requirements specific to healthcare content in this jurisdiction

child_abuse.description: Whether child abuse must be reported

self_harm_risk.description: Whether self-harm risk must be reported

reporting_authority.description: Authority to which reports must be made

data_protection.description: Data protection requirements specific to health data
examples: HIPAA compliance required for health information.
GDPR applies with additional health data protections.
Local data protection laws require health data remain in-country.

parental_notification_laws.description: Laws requiring parental notification for healthcare services or information
examples: Parental notification required for reproductive health services for minors under 16.
No parental notification laws; minors can access confidential healthcare from age 14.
Varies by state; some require parental notification for abortion, others do not.

content_regulation.description: Content regulation laws affecting healthcare information for minors
examples: No specific content regulation for healthcare education.
Sexual health education content regulated; must align with national curriculum standards.
Prohibition on discussing certain topics with minors without parental consent.

healthcare_system_notes.description: Relevant information about healthcare system (access, insurance, provider types) that affects content contextualization
examples: Universal healthcare system (NHS). Primary care through GP referral. Most services free at point of use.
Mixed private/public insurance system. Many uninsured or underinsured. Cost is significant barrier to care.
Universal healthcare with private option. Most citizens have access to subsidized care.

emergency_resources.description: Emergency contact information for this country

number_or_service.description: Phone number or service identifier (e.g., 'Text HOME to 741741')

tier.description: Country tier (1=full profile, 2=secondary, 3=basic) for implementation prioritization

next_review.description: Date profile should next be reviewed
